}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[https://www.mail-archive.com/ath10k@lists.infradead.org/msg05819.html A message on the ath9k mailing list] which notes the chip P/N :(QCA9880-BR4A), as well as the [https://www.mail-archive.com/ath10k@lists.infradead.org/msg05853.html lspci -nnv output].
==Links of Interest== *[https://eko.one.pl/forum/viewtopic.php?id=16402 ''iwinfo'' on '''eko.one.pl''' forums] (OUI: 4C:5E:0C) :[[MikroTik R11e-5HacT]] (168c:003c/19b6:d03c) :[[MikroTik R11e-2HPnD]] (168c:0033/19b6:d016)
